thread.section_title: Grand Hotel de Paris - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Very good for price and location
thread.title_full: Very good for price and location - Review of Grand Hotel de Paris, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: sianm1
title: Very good for price and location
text:
We bought our stay here last minute as a package with our Eurostar tickets which meant the hotel only cost us around Â£10 each per night. For this price, you can't complain. The hotel was clean, and warm, staff were friendly, shower was great and sheets and towels changed daily.
Great location right by several metro lines though we struggled to find good food nearby.
A nice, cheap hotel in central Paris
